website_summaries.verdict: This higher-end grill is well constructed and designed to last.
pros: Made to be built into your outdoor kitchen
comes completely assembled except for the grates
cons: You must have some kind of an outdoor kitchen to use this natural gas grill

customer_reviews.title: Very well built, clear installation directions
customer_reviews.text: Great design and very well built with clear installation directions, took only a few hours for me to install. I have some tools but I'm not an expert. The most time was taken by getting the right adapter for the smaller gas feed line that came with the grill (2 trips to Lowes) - I was replacing an old grill head.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level into the high end grills.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this grill for a few months now. Being a Florida resident, we grill outside 2-3 days/week. This grill holds the heat well and disassembles for cleaning very easily. It's probably the low end of the high end grills but beats Weber by a long shot. Worth the money if you grill often.
customer_reviews.author: PAHunter

customer_reviews.title: Annoying noise
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty grill. My complaint is that I have to restart the grill several times as it starts to sound like a jet engine.
customer_reviews.author: KY

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation!
customer_reviews.text: Although the installation directions are a bit lacking in the manual, overall it was pretty easy to install and set up the propane model.
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 5 years ago. Love it! Easy to clean, polished look doesnt fade. I live in Chicago and after harsh winters its still holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: All stainless. Fire box joints are all welded. It's quite clear every component is built to last. This thing is a tank!
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this grill. It looks great installed at my outdoor kitchen. It was definitely a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: curtis lee

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Great size, burns much hotter than old version. Looks great too
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality grill
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality grill with good fit, function, made of sufficient gauge steel
customer_reviews.author: DG3

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This grill does it!!! Well made, nice looking. I read a few review about oxidation top of the grill but we’ll see if I have to report anything like that in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, looks good and runs nice and hot.
customer_reviews.text: This grill is great. Looks amazing and cooks nice and evenly. I highly recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm very pleased with this grill. Definately a heavy duty product. Nothing flimsy about it. Gets hot fast.
customer_reviews.author: DWilkes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grill, arrived in perfect condition. Quality product, through and through!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Dounis

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: We received this BBQ right away. No dents or dings on the outside, however it was missing 5 parts including temperature gauge and transformer and cotter pens. It had a broken bulb and handle....... What a mess. We called BULL Grills directly and they sent replacement parts out right away.....My husband will have to assemble. Not good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WELL PRICED GRILL
customer_reviews.text: FOR THE PRICE, THIS IS A GREAT BUILT IN GRILL. LOOKS GREAT AND COOKS WELL. THE ONLY NEGATIVE WOULD BE THE THERMOMETER WHICH DOESN'T SEEM TO BE TOO ACCURATE.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Vu

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Stainless and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money and as described. Heavy Duty Stainless and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill...not only is it beautiful, but it appears to be made extremely well. Nothing cheap about it. Heavy duty and fairly easy to clean. I LOVE the large tray at the bottom that catches all the grease, etc..Just pull it out, wash with soap and water and line it with foil. Sweet. We chose the natural gas grill so we would never have to bother with gas tanks again! I highly recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Bull Lonestar grill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to light built solid no problems . Very easy put together heats up quickly and the control knobs are big and simple to use
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice grill
customer_reviews.text: Well made. It does have a good bit of vent area so it is not a sealed type grill probably beacuse it is gas.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McGlohn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Basic 30" grille. No extra stuff just base gr8 m with quality construction I would recommend this grill to anyone needing a grill with extras
customer_reviews.author: William R Germann

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Checked prices vs quality, very pleased with this product. BBQ almost built, so have not used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: PC Rondo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Had enough of the good enough just isn't. A long overdue step up from the traditional miserable junk they sell at the local stores. I installed mine on a floating table I made. A lot of clearance and easy snow removal. It's a nice quality no bull product, but I think there's a lot of pride included in the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Has a large flam to get it lit. Lights are awesome. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

product_meta.title: Bull Outdoor Products 87049 Lonestar Select Natural Gas Drop-In Grill Head
product_meta.description: Style:Natural GasThe Lonestar Select is a 4-Burner Stainless Steel Gas Barbecue Grill head. Four welded stainless steel bar burners, each featuring 15,000 BTU's of cooking power for a total of 60,000 BTU's with Piezo igniters and Zinc Knobs for each burner. 304 Stainless Steel Construction with Solid Stainless Steel Grates and Single Piece Dual Lined Hood. Twin Lighting System for easy night time cooking. Warming rack with 210 sq. Inch plus a cooking surface of 810 sq. Inch. For more information contact Bull Outdoor Products at contact@bullbbq.com. This a Natural Gas model.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars43 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
